= Stages =
|| A. Source file processing || 1. Read source file ||
|| || 2. Split source file into char'**', with each char'**' containing one line ||
|| || 3. foreach( char* in char**) {parse(char*)} ||
|| B. Parsing || 1. Ignore if this line is inside a multi-line comment section||
|| || 2. Remove unnecessary white-space and in-line comment ||
